subject: fix: restore missing UI elements lost in React migration
body:
- Debug banner: now always visible (green "0 errors" pill; red error
  log on errors) instead of hidden until first error
- Header buttons: restored Install + Update PWA buttons that were
  dropped during React migration (only Settings gear remained)
- Tab spacing: wrapped multi-component tabs in space-y-6 divs to add
  consistent 24px gaps between Activity, Work, and Health sub-sections
- Chart text: set Chart.defaults.color from --text-secondary and
  borderColor from --chart-grid for readable legends on dark theme
